raw_body: BERTRAM WILLARD WHITE (BOMMER) – 19.07.1948 – 27.12.2023. Adored partner of Corinne Hindle,​ dearly loved stepdad to Sandrine and Michelle,​ precious son of the late Bertram and Beryl White,​ cherished brother of 15 siblings,​ passed away peacefully on Wednesday,​ 27th of December surrounded by his loved ones. A wonderful and loving man who will be sadly missed by all who knew him.085616
